titlestmt.titleproper: Lydia Leaming Smith autograph collection 1800-1894 ca. 1810-1850

scopecontent.p: The volume includes autographs of prominent Philadelphia lawyers, judges, and businessmen collected and arranged by Lydia Leaming Smith in 1894. Almost all of the autographs are letters, and many deal with legal decisions. Men represented in the collection include: Charles Ingersoll; Jared Ingersoll; Thomas Wharton; William Meredith; John Meredith Read; William Rawle; Horace Binney; Eli Kirk Price; Craig Biddle; Jacob Waln; and John Sargeant. A few of the end pages contain newsclippings of obituaries of some of the men covered in the album.
